name: Lava Rise (buzzgamee)
description:
Lava Rise is a vertical platformer with a good purpose of saving dinosaurs!

You play as Dino who is the last dinosaur alive and you need to help him escape the rising lava as well as other weird looking monsters in order to avoid getting extinct.

Key Features:

  • Fun and challenging gameplay
  • Good environment and look
  • Familiar with games you probably know

This is my first major project used for learning purposes so please tell me what you think and what should be added for better experience, can't wait for your feedback!

Credits:

Dino made by Arks from itch.io
